rules_text: When Remember the Good enters, return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control with a finality counter on it. When that creature leaves the battlefield, return Remember the Good to its owner’s hand.
notes:
When Remember the Good enters, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control and attach Remember the Good to it.
When enchanted creature dies, exile it and return Remember the Good to its owner’s hand.
